thread.title: Jackie T-The proud mother of one!!!!
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Jackie T-The proud mother of one!!!!

author: Jackie T-The proud mother of one!!!!
title: Jackie T-The proud mother of one!!!!
text:
The dress was VERY difficult to find but after calling 25 different states and boutiques I found Peaches. Peaches staff and management really know their inventory and what can be delivered and when! The dress my daughter HAD to have for JR prom was 11335 and was $850.00. I took a leap of faith that the dress would be perfect and delivered on time. The dress was truly perfect and delivered 2 weeks early.
Sherry Hill was represented VERY well by Peaches Boutique. We WILL use them again!
Sincerely ,
Jackie T
The proud mother of one
